Title: Sadak 2
Writer: Pushpdeep Bhardwaj (additional dialogue), Mahesh Bhatt, Suhrita Sengupta
Actors: Priyanka Bose, Alia Bhatt, Pooja Bhatt, Sanjay Dutt
Plot: The film picks up where Sadak left off, revolving around the journey with a young girl who becomes an important character in the life of the protagonist, and the reason for him to stay alive.
